channel.title: [C4D] Few designs, CC please. [Updated]
channel.description:
Heres a few 3d things i threw together, each model was made in wings 3d and rendered and textured in c4d.
CC please:
Plain model: [img]http://img122.imageshack.us/img122/5385/3dorigpo0.png[/img]
And a teapot im working on: [img]http://img504.imageshack.us/img504/6240/teapotrx2.png[/img]
Well finding out that b-spline option makes splines smoother, I had more confidence to freehand a wine glass :P Each material was made by me by what i have already known, just went back and forth changing colors. The only thing i need help doing is making the bottom of the glass less bright and im not sure where i add shadows =\ [img]http://img87.imageshack.us/img87/8305/wineglasstq5.png[/img]

item.title: [C4D] Few designs, CC please. [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Then what a better time.
Get into EVERYTHING you can get your hands on.
What you’re doing is nothing new.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Few designs, CC please. [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:14, topic:180288”]Honestly, try to learn C4D before you post this.

If you posted any of this in any serious 3D Graphics forums, you would get shoo-ed away so fast.

At least read the manual or something, you don’t even know how to add shadows.[/quote]
when i first used c4d i never really got into lighting…

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Few designs, CC please. [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

exe626:

I don’t remember all the buttons and what-not in C4D, but I believe to add a reflection, it has something to do with the texture menu on the right. As for the lighting, it seems it’s hitting the floor and shining up. What lighting tool are you using?

Omni.

Read full topic

[/quote]

the wine glass looks good but the base of it is relatively small…[/quote]
yea, somewhat, thats really how i picture them… But the base is also not dark enough(to bright), how do i fix that?

item.title: [C4D] Few designs, CC please. [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Yes.
Right next to the move and zoom buttons.
Top right corner of the viewport.
Click and hold.

Or use the Alt+Mousewhatever combinations.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Few designs, CC please. [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

what will really help me with all that is, Is there a free rotate view in c4d? Like in all other programs you press the middle mouse button. Because thats the reason i cant get good angles i feel limited.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Few designs, CC please. [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Fakes bumps in your materials?

New images:
Need more antialiasing, bounce lighting, better lighting.
Stretched wall textures.
Very stretched counter textures.
The cabinets look good actually, but they look like they’re just textures, not models.
Work on scale, that looks like a very awkwardly shaped place to be a kitchen.
And design too, It wouldn’t really function as a kitchen either.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Few designs, CC please. [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:2, topic:180288”]Glass material not realistic.
Check which way your normals are facing, they usually get inverted when importing from Wings.
Also, the lighting isn’t good at all. At least add shadows. And try researching studio setups.
The floor has a very lowres texture. Try and find a better one. And add bump to it aswell.[/quote]
Ill overlook the shadows right now, its been a while since i have used c4d.
May i also ask what bump is?

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Few designs, CC please. [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Glass material not realistic.
Check which way your normals are facing, they usually get inverted when importing from Wings.
Also, the lighting isn’t good at all. At least add shadows. And try researching studio setups.
The floor has a very lowres texture. Try and find a better one. And add bump to it aswell.

Read full topic
